sptlrpc_rule Struct Reference
[sptlrpc]

A rule specifies a flavor to be used by a ptlrpc connection between two Lustre parts. More...

Detailed Description

A rule specifies a flavor to be used by a ptlrpc connection between two Lustre parts.
